title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: A Computing Thinking-Based Capacity-Building Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of computational thinking (CT)—decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, and algorithms—to solving real-world math problems.
Learners can collaborate with peers in an LMS-based self-directed learning environment to complete a CT-integrated instructional design project.
Learners can develop educational strategies that promote problem-solving skills and critical thinking through CT-based math activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
